Question: Haze Automotive CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Haze Automotive

Product: CES 2024 Automotive Highlights

- Google Built-In updates Android Auto for real-time EV range information
- Honda debuts Honda 0 Series, new line of EVs with advanced autonomous driving features
- Hyundai presents vision for hydrogen-powered vehicles and large-scale green hydrogen production solutions
- Kia showcases series of concepts for future commercial electric vans with innovative features
- Lamborghini introduces Telemetry X concept for in-car tech to improve driver performance
- Mercedes-Benz debuts new MB.OS system with AI virtual assistant and enhanced 3D graphics
- VinFast unveils pair of concepts including minicar VF 3 and VF wild pickup concept
- Volkswagen announces new digital assistant IDA and refreshed Golf GTI with new head and tail lights
Summary_cn:
汽车雾霾
产品：CES 2024汽车亮点

- Google内置更新Android Auto，提供实时电动汽车续航信息
- 本田推出本田0系列，新一代配备先进自主驾驶功能的电动汽车
- 现代展示以氢能为动力的汽车以及大规模绿色氢能生产解决方案的愿景
- 起亚展示一系列创新特点的未来商用电动货车概念车
- 兰博基尼推出Telemetry X概念，旨在改善驾驶员性能的车载科技
- 奔驰推出新的MB.OS系统，配备人工智能虚拟助手和增强的3D图像
- VinFast揭示了一对概念车，包括微型车VF 3和VF野马皮卡概念
- 大众宣布新的数字助手IDA和更新的Golf GTI，配备新的前后灯光
